name: get_school
description: Retrieve a school record from the SchoolDigger database

name: get_schools
description: Search the SchoolDigger database for schools. You may use any combination of criteria as query parameters.

q.description: Search term - note: will match school name or city (optional)
q.title: Q

qSearchSchoolNameOnly.description: For parameter 'q', only search school names instead of school and city (optional)
qSearchSchoolNameOnly.title: Qsearchschoolnameonly

districtID.description: Search for schools within this district (7 digit district id) (optional)
districtID.title: Districtid

level.description: Search for schools at this level. Valid values: 'Elementary', 'Middle', 'High', 'Alt', 'Public', 'Private' (optional). 'Public' returns all Elementary, Middle, High and Alternative schools
level.title: Level

city.description: Search for schools in this city (optional)
city.title: City

zip.description: Search for schools in this 5-digit zip code (optional)
zip.title: Zip

isMagnet.description: True = return only magnet schools, False = return only non-magnet schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)
isMagnet.title: Ismagnet

isCharter.description: True = return only charter schools, False = return only non-charter schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)
isCharter.title: Ischarter

isVirtual.description: True = return only virtual schools, False = return only non-virtual schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)
isVirtual.title: Isvirtual

isTitleI.description: True = return only Title I schools, False = return only non-Title I schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)
isTitleI.title: Istitlei

isTitleISchoolwide.description: True = return only Title I school-wide schools, False = return only non-Title I school-wide schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)
isTitleISchoolwide.title: Istitleischoolwide

nearLatitude.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. 44.982560) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only.) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
nearLatitude.title: Nearlatitude

nearLongitude.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. -124.289185) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only.) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
nearLongitude.title: Nearlongitude

nearAddress.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of this address. Example: '123 Main St. AnyTown CA 90001' (optional) (Ultra, Mega API level only) IMPORTANT NOTE: If you have the lat/long of the address, use nearLatitude and nearLongitude instead for much faster response times
nearAddress.title: Nearaddress

distanceMiles.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (Default 5 miles) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
distanceMiles.title: Distancemiles

boxLatitudeNW.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLatitudeNW.title: Boxlatitudenw

boxLongitudeNW.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLongitudeNW.title: Boxlongitudenw

boxLatitudeSE.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLatitudeSE.title: Boxlatitudese

page.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
page.title: Page

perPage.description: Number of schools to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
perPage.title: Perpage

sortBy.description: Sort list. Values are: schoolname, distance, rank. For descending order, precede with '-' i.e. -schoolname (optional, default: schoolname)
sortBy.title: Sortby

includeUnrankedSchoolsInRankSort.description: If sortBy is 'rank', this boolean determines if schools with no rank are included in the result (optional, default: false)
includeUnrankedSchoolsInRankSort.title: Includeunrankedschoolsinranksort

name: get_district
description: Retrieve a single district record from the SchoolDigger database

name: get_districts
description: Search the SchoolDigger database for districts. You may use any combination of criteria as query parameters.

q.description: Search term - note: will match district name or city (optional)
q.title: Q

city.description: Search for districts in this city (optional)
city.title: City

zip.description: Search for districts in this 5-digit zip code (optional)
zip.title: Zip

nearLatitude.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. 44.982560) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only. Mega API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
nearLatitude.title: Nearlatitude

nearLongitude.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. -124.289185) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only. Mega API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
nearLongitude.title: Nearlongitude

boundaryAddress.description: Full U.S. address: flag returned districts that include this address in its attendance boundary. Example: '123 Main St. AnyTown CA 90001' (optional) (Mega API level only)
boundaryAddress.title: Boundaryaddress

distanceMiles.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (Default 50 miles) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
distanceMiles.title: Distancemiles

isInBoundaryOnly.description: Return only the districts that include given location (nearLatitude/nearLongitude) or (boundaryAddress) in its attendance boundary (Mega API level only)
isInBoundaryOnly.title: Isinboundaryonly

boxLatitudeNW.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLatitudeNW.title: Boxlatitudenw

boxLongitudeNW.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLongitudeNW.title: Boxlongitudenw

boxLatitudeSE.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLatitudeSE.title: Boxlatitudese

boxLongitudeSE.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLongitudeSE.title: Boxlongitudese

page.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
page.title: Page

perPage.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
perPage.title: Perpage

sortBy.description: Sort list. Values are: districtname, distance, rank. For descending order, precede with '-' i.e. -districtname (optional, default: districtname)
sortBy.title: Sortby

includeUnrankedDistrictsInRankSort.description: If sortBy is 'rank', this boolean determines if districts with no rank are included in the result (optional, default: false)
includeUnrankedDistrictsInRankSort.title: Includeunrankeddistrictsinranksort

name: get_rank_schools
description: Returns a SchoolDigger school ranking list

year.description: The ranking year (leave blank for most recent year) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
year.title: Year

page.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
page.title: Page

perPage.description: Number of schools to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
perPage.title: Perpage

name: get_rank_districts
description: Returns a SchoolDigger district ranking list

year.description: The ranking year (leave blank for most recent year) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
year.title: Year

page.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
page.title: Page

perPage.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
perPage.title: Perpage

name: autocomplete
description: Returns a simple and quick list of schools for use in a client-typed autocomplete

st.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA') (optional -- leave blank to search entire U.S.)
st.title: St

level.description: Search for schools at this level only. Valid values: 'Elementary', 'Middle', 'High', 'Alt', 'Private' (optional - leave blank to search for all schools)
level.title: Level

qSearchCityStateName.description: Extend the search term to include city and state (e.g. 'Lincoln el paso' matches Lincoln Middle School in El Paso) (optional)
qSearchCityStateName.title: Qsearchcitystatename

returnCount.description: Number of schools to return. Valid values: 1-20. (default: 10) Minimum: -2147483648 Maximum: 2147483647
returnCount.title: Returncount

boxLatitudeNW.description: Search within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional. Ultra, Mega API levels only.) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLatitudeNW.title: Boxlatitudenw

boxLongitudeNW.description: Search within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional. Ultra, Mega API levels only.) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLongitudeNW.title: Boxlongitudenw

boxLatitudeSE.description: Search within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional. Ultra, Mega API levels only.) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLatitudeSE.title: Boxlatitudese

boxLongitudeSE.description: Search within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional. Ultra, Mega API levels only.) Minimum: -1.7976931348623157e+308 Maximum: 1.7976931348623157e+308
boxLongitudeSE.title: Boxlongitudese
